description: Build a Todo web app. Docker is pre-configured - ONLY edit todo-app/src/ files!

userStories.title: Create database connection
acceptanceCriteria: Use mysqli to connect to host 'mysql', database 'todoapp', user 'root', password 'rootpass'
File must have valid PHP syntax

userStories.title: Create todo API
acceptanceCriteria: GET: return all todos as JSON
POST: create new todo from JSON body
File must have valid PHP syntax

userStories.title: Create frontend
acceptanceCriteria: Include script to fetch from api.php
